ComicInfo.Summary: The Return of Kulan Gath Part Seven: Sacrifice For a God: As Kulan Gath begins to gather Borat-Na Fori's forces into his own army, Sonja and her companions fight off the Hunter and escape in a boat that takes them down an underground river. They finally make landfall in a strange and mysterious land. Gath captures the Goddess.
